tr.td: Include only enough food consumption information to document effects or as necessary to explain effects on body weight. If food consumption was comparable among the groups, then a statement to this effect is sufficient, and it is not necessary to report quantitative summary data in a table. Otherwise, report findings in a manner similar to body weight data and fill a table if helpful in demonstrating a treatment-related effect.

g:HTMLPanel.div: Table 6. Food Consumption (g/kg bw/day) in the Androgen Agonist Assaya

tbl:FSTRA2FlexTableButtons2.note: Note: At minimum report for first and last days and food consumption for the overall study.

w:DERRichTextAreaPUT.name: HA||ResultsAndDiscussion>>FootTable6>>Html
w:DERRichTextAreaPUT.p:
aData were obtained from page [#] of the study report. N = Number of animals in the group. SD = Standard Deviation.
* Significantly different from controls at p<0.05. ** Significantly different from controls at p<0.01.

w:DERRichTextAreaPUT.p:
aData were obtained from page [#] of the study report. N = Number of animals in the group. SD = Standard Deviation.
* Significantly different from controls at p<0.05. ** Significantly different from controls at p<0.01.
